## Source: ossf-package-analysis (8b6dc3e380e435ff7d74a44ec8841c1577a1bd74c03ef3dc368e2514e485d8fc)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'pai-web-components' @ 99.99.99 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
